Caret Color

# Caret Color

## Usage

Please refer to the documentation on the Tailwind CSS website

## Compatibility

| Class                     | Support        |
| ------------------------- | -------------- |
| ```
caret-{n}
```         | ✅ Full Support |
| ```
caret-[n]
```         | ✅ Full Support |
| ```
caret-black
```       | ✅ Full Support |
| ```
caret-white
```       | ✅ Full Support |
| ```
caret-transparent
``` | ✅ Full Support |
| ```
caret-inherit
```     | 🌐 Web only    |
| ```
caret-current
```     | 🌐 Web only    |

## Contributors

We are looking for contributors for the following:

### Add `pointer-events-none`

`caretColor` should map to `cursorColor`
